reviewText:
I wish I would have had this video for my first three weddings. It would have made an enormous difference. The attention to detail, the common sense approach, the serene exposition and visual clarification makes it a winner. Finally, a video that focuses on the CEREMONY itself, as opposed to the whole shebang of pre-wedding and post-wedding ceremonies (which I find droll).
It gave me that feeling I had when I finally realized I could spell SUPERCALIFRAGILISTICEXPIALIDOCIOUS.  A feeling of confidence, serenity (and a little cockiness).
Now,
If I can get anyone else to marry me, I'll put the video to good use.
